official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to sell reserved phosphate interests of the United States in certain lands in Florida to Arthur M. Marshall and Carl F. Steinfield.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to sell reserved phosphate interests of the United States in certain lands in Florida to Arthur M. Marshall and Carl F. Steinfield.
